long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for the Chrome browser that helps you develop and debug Stackflow Apps.

Currently, if you're developing a web app on Stackflow and something goes wrong, it can be a pain to interpret, and solve the problem because you don't have much information other than the app's screen.

Stackflow Devtools is designed to eliminate this frustration and take the information about the stack to the next level of abstraction so you can troubleshoot with the data you need.

Major Features

- Stack Viewer
Visualize what's going on inside your stack that you can't easily see in your app.

- Stack Explorer
It shows the current stack data in a interactive tree view. It also provides a snapshot of the stack data.

- Action Dispatcher
Instead of just checking the stack status, you can trigger actions like push and pop to inject your favorite activities into your Stackflow app.
The Action Dispatcher also has the ability to read the activities that you pass as params to the stackflow() function and automatically generate a form for the activity params needed for the action.

- Event Logger
View a log of events that have affected the stack.
